DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : To evaluate lifestyle intervention ( diet exercise ) reduce maternal weight gain , incidence pregnancy complication minimize number macrosomic infant .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Intervention With Diet Physical Activity Obese Pregnant Women
DOC.detailed_description: Obese pregnant woman BMI > 30 randomize Diet + Exercise , Exercise control ( 1:1:1 ) order reduce maternal weight gain less 5 kg pregnancy . The effect child mother study evaluate study : Is possible reduce Number Macrosomic Infants With Abundant Fat Tissue Lifestyle Intervention Pregnancy ( NCT01235676 )
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year BMI > 30 Singleton pregnancy Must speak understand Danish Alcohol drug abuse Diabetes type I critical medical disease .
